title: University parking revolving fund
context: [ยง304A-2275] University parking revolving fund. There is established the university parking revolving fund. All fees, fines, or other moneys collected under subpart B of part VI shall be deposited into this fund. All moneys in the fund are hereby appropriated for the purposes of, and shall be expended by the board of regents in the manner specified by, section [304A-2167.5]. [L 2006, c 75, pt of ยง2]
